content: **knitted hat / hipster hat in drops fabel and drops kid-silk piece is knitted bottom up with rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-514 yarn group a + a or c ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - m/l head circumference approx 56/58 - 58/60 cm **materials** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50 g colour 920 fantasy land 50-50 g colour 200 grey and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25 g colour 22 ash **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row vertically in stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
